Features.name: Size
Features.Negative characteristics: The phone is too big and difficult to use with one hand

Features.name: Back cover
Features.Negative characteristics: The phone's back cover is very slippery and slides easily

Features.name: Sides
Features.Negative characteristics: The sides of the phone are very slippery

Features.name: OS experience
Features.Positive characteristics: The phone has a very apple-like OS experience, everything is fluid, simple and just works

Features.name: Fingerprint sensor
Features.Negative characteristics: The fingerprint sensor takes a few weeks to get the hang of and is far from the best in the market

Features.name: Battery life
Features.Positive characteristics: Battery life is incredible. Haven't charged my phone in 4 days

Features.name: Camera
Features.Negative characteristics: The screen is poorly calibrated and can't display true colors, making it difficult to trust the camera

Features.name: Reception
Features.Positive characteristics: The reception is really good, my previous phone would get H+ where i live, this one gets LTE and it is fast

Features.name: Screen
Features.Negative characteristics: The screen on this device is really poorly calibrated. It has a very yellow tint that is very noticeable when watching video, it can't display true white (looks creamy) or sky blue (has a greenish hue). The background looks pixelated after unlocking until you scroll, not sure what that's about.

Features.name: Performance
Features.Positive characteristics: The phone runs fast and smoothly

Features.name: Weight
Features.Positive characteristics: The phone is not that heavy at all

Features.name: Charging
Features.Negative characteristics: The single adapter cord doesn't adapt to standard A type female end found on most plug in chargers

Features.name: SIM card holder
Features.Negative characteristics: The SIM card holder doesn't release enough to remove it from the phone by inserting the key which is included

Features.name: Value for money
Features.Positive characteristics: Extremely happy with the value for my dollar

Features.name: Reliability
Features.Negative characteristics: Used the phone for less than 24 hours before it stopped working. When it did work I lost service constantly then the phone suddenly could not read my sim card and I no longer had service.

Features.name: Upgrade
Features.Negative characteristics: It is a nice phone, but doesn't feel like an upgrade from my 5a
